request_monophosphines module¶

request_monophosphines.draw_from_phos_df(phos_df: DataFrame, filename: str = 'phosphine_set.png', legend: str = 'CID') → None[source]¶

Draws the set of phosphines from a phosphine DataFrame.

request_monophosphines.prune_by_elements(mol_formulas: Series) → Series[source]¶

Makes a T/F mask to prune the phosphine DataFrame based on whether the mol. formula contains only the desired main group elements, and contains at most one P atom.

request_monophosphines.prune_by_elements_helper(mol_formula: str) → bool[source]¶

Determines whether a mol. formula conforms to our desired constraints, i.e. only desired main group elements and only one P atom.

request_monophosphines.prune_phos_df(phos_df: DataFrame) → DataFrame[source]¶

Removes undesired results from a PubChem API request for general phosphines.

request_monophosphines.request_monophosphines(properties: tuple = ('MolecularFormula', 'MolecularWeight', 'CanonicalSMILES', 'Complexity', 'Charge'), max_records: int = -1, smarts: str = '[CX4,c][PX3]([CX4,c])[CX4,c]') → DataFrame[source]¶

Makes an API request to PubChem for phosphines (i.e. PR3) and prunes the results (see prun_phos_df).
